Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: secure2010
Reviews.Content: I had a 4 CCTV DVR system and 1 of the cams got busted. I then bought this cam along with a 9 CCTV DVR system. Instead of using the default cam, I decided to use this to cover the back door of the house and I was surprised, it's one of the well covered area especially in the evening. It worked well with my 9 CCTV DVR system and there's no uassle in installing it. the prices of the cam is not that cheap but its worth it. I highly recommend this cam.

Reviews.Title: would not purchase again
Reviews.Author: Chrome
Reviews.Content: When mounted on the wall the sensor would not pick up motion to activate the flashing light. Would not buy again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fake Dummy IR Camera easy to install with mounting bracket & screws
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras. Adjustable swivel mount for easy installation
Built-in light sensor will turn on flash light at night automatically. A power switch can shut off flash light when you need
The inexpensive solution for security/theft problems with high imitation. Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy
Package included: 10 dummy cameras, 10 of 3x2" Security Warning Signs. The camera requires 2 x AAA batteries (Not Included)
